mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select * from (select * from (select num as mNum,title,rate from movieInfo) M join (select num as tNum, movieNum, theaterNum,screenDate,screenTime,remainSeat from movieTime where left(screenTime,2) >= date_format(sysdate(),'%H') or screenDate > sysdate() ) T on(M.mNum = T.movieNum)) A join (select num as sNum,cinemaNum,name,seatCount,filmType from theater) C on(C.sNum = A.theaterNum))B join (select num as cNum,name as cName from cinema) I on(I.cNum = B.cinemaNum)) F where F.title Like concat('%',#{title},'%') and F.cName Like concat('%',#{theater},'%') and F.screenDate Like concat('%',#{date},'%') and screenDate > date_add(now(),interval -1 day) order by rate ,cname
